items.title: Guides
items.description: Docusaurus was designed from the ground up to be easily installed and         used to get your website up and running quickly.

items.title: Api Documentation
items.description: Docusaurus lets you focus on your docs, and we'll do the chores. Go ahead and move your docs into the docs directory.

items.title: Releases
items.description: Extend or customize your website layout by reusing React. Docusaurus can         be extended while reusing the same header and footer.
